page.title: 15RADIO OXFORD
page.content: RADIO OXFORD IS A PUBLIC RADIO CHANNEL. MOST PEOPLE HAVE RADIOS.RADIO CHANNELS ARE 1,2,3. RADIO OXFORD IS OUR LOCAL RADIO STATION.IT SPECIALISES IN LOCAL NEWS AND INFORMATION. RADIO OXFORDS BASE IS ON THE SECOND FLOOR OF ALLIED-CARPETS IN OXFORD.THE RADIO OXFORD CRUE ARE MAVIS BEEN ,STEWART WOODCOCK , NICK HAYDON ,JOHN BRIGHT, JEAN JUDGE, PETER GRANT ,RODGER CLARK, JACQUELINE, JONES, JOHN SIMPSON, MARY SMALL, CLARE CHRISTIE, STUART CAMERON AND PETER YORK.THERE ARE 4 STUDIOS IN RADIO OXFORD. THESE ARE SOME OF THE THINGS THAT ARE BROADCAST: NEWS ,FARMING , MY CHOICE, THE WEEK TODAY ,THE PHONE IN ,SPORT AND JON BRIGGS. BY PAUL CHAPMAN.
